title: Was the security guard in Mandalay Bay a "partner" of the collective shooter in Las Vegas?
subtitle: The false and false news sites stated, without any evidence, that the security guard welcomed as a hero to assist in the mass ceasefire in Las Vegas was in fact a partner.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Mandalay Bay Security Guard (Jessus Campos) was a "partner" of the Las Vegas Sniper, Stephen Paddock.
